text: (melum,) nir kuruviraka: ‘‘Allah natinale tavira nan enakku oru nanmaiyaiyo timaiyaiyo ceytu kolla cakti peramatten. Nan maraivanavarrai ariyakkutumayin nanmaikalaiye atikamakat tetik kontiruppen; oru tinkume ennai anuki irukkatu. Nan (pavikalukku) accamutti eccarikkai ceypavanum, nampikkai kolpavarkalukku narceyti kurupavanume tavira verillai
